## CreateCookieJarOptions.rejectPublicSuffixes property

Reject cookies that match those defined in the [Public Suffix List](https://publicsuffix.org/) (e.g.; domains like "com" and "co.uk").

Defaults to `true` if not specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rejectPublicSuffixes?: boolean | undefined;
```
